verses.verse: וַ֠יִּשְׁלַח <WH7971> sent [חִירָם כ] (חוּרָ֨ם <WH2438> Hiram ק) מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king צֹ֥ר <WH6865> of Tyre מַלְאָכִים֮ <WH4397> messengers אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִיד֒ <WH1732> to David וַעֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> and timber אֲרָזִ֔ים <WH730> of cedars וְחָרָשֵׁ֣י <WH2796> and carpenters קִ֔יר <WH7023> with masons וְחָרָשֵׁ֖י <WH2796> artificer עֵצִ֑ים <WH6086> trees לִבְנ֥וֹת <WH1129> to build ל֖וֹ בָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> him an house

וַיֵּ֣דַע <WH3045> perceived דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> And David כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הֱכִינ֧וֹ <WH3559> had confirmed יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> that the LORD לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> him king עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> over Israel כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נִשֵּׂ֤את <WH5375> was lifted up לְמַ֙עְלָה֙ <WH4605> on high מַלְכוּת֔וֹ <WH4438> for his kingdom בַּעֲב֖וּר <WH5668> the sake עַמּ֥וֹ <WH5971> because of his people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel פ

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> took דָּוִ֥יד <WH1732> And David ע֛וֹד <WH5750> more נָשִׁ֖ים <WH802> more wives בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> at Jerusalem וַיּ֧וֹלֶד <WH3205> begat דָּוִ֛יד <WH1732> and David ע֖וֹד <WH5750> of more בָּנִ֥ים <WH1121> more sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <WH1323> and daughters

וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> These שְׁמ֣וֹת <WH8034> Now these [are] the names הַיְלוּדִ֔ים <WH3205> of [his] children אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after הָיוּ־ <WH1961> become ל֖וֹ בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> which he had in Jerusalem שַׁמּ֣וּעַ <WH8051> Shammua וְשׁוֹבָ֔ב <WH7727> and Shobab נָתָ֖ן <WH5416> Nathan וּשְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <WH8010> and Solomon
וְיִבְחָ֥ר <WH2984> And Ibhar וֶאֱלִישׁ֖וּעַ <WH474> and Elishua וְאֶלְפָּֽלֶט׃ <WH467> and Elpalet
וְנֹ֥גַהּ <WH5052> And Nogah וְנֶ֖פֶג <WH5298> and Nepheg וְיָפִֽיעַ׃ <WH3309> and Japhia
וֶאֱלִישָׁמָ֥ע <WH476> And Elishama וּבְעֶלְיָדָ֖ע <WH1182> and Beeliada וֶאֱלִיפָֽלֶט׃ <WH467> and Eliphalet

וַיִּשְׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> heard פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <WH6430> And when the Philistines כִּי־ <WH3588> for נִמְשַׁ֨ח <WH4886> was anointed דָּוִ֤יד <WH1732> that David לְמֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> king עַל־ <WH5921> over כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> over all Israel וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <WH5927> went up כָל־ <WH3605> all פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> all the Philistines לְבַקֵּ֣שׁ <WH1245> to seek אֶת־ <WH853> דָּוִ֑יד <WH1732> David וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> heard דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> And David וַיֵּצֵ֖א <WH3318> [of it] and went out לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> against
וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> And the Philistines בָּ֑אוּ <WH935> came וַֽיִּפְשְׁט֖וּ <WH6584> and spread בְּעֵ֥מֶק <WH6010> themselves in the valley רְפָאִֽים׃ <WH7497> of Rephaim

וַיִּשְׁאַ֨ל <WH7592> enquired דָּוִ֤יד <WH1732> And David בֵּאלֹהִים֙ <WH430> of God לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying הַאֶֽעֱלֶה֙ <WH5927> Shall I go up עַל־ <WH5921> against [פְּלִשְׁתִּיִּים כ] (פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> Philistine ק) וּנְתַתָּ֖ם <WH5414> for I will deliver בְּיָדִ֑י <WH3027> them into thine hand וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said ל֤וֹ יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Jehovah עֲלֵ֔ה <WH5927> unto him Go up וּנְתַתִּ֖ים <WH5414> will give בְּיָדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3027> your hand

וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <WH5927> So they came up בְּבַֽעַל־ פְּרָצִים֮ <WH1188> to Baalperazim וַיַּכֵּ֣ם <WH5221> smote שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> there דָּוִיד֒ <WH1732> and David וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> them there Then David פָּרַ֨ץ <WH6555> hath broken in הָֽאֱלֹהִ֧ים <WH430> God אֶת־ <WH853> אוֹיְבַ֛י <WH341> upon mine enemies בְּיָדִ֖י <WH3027> by mine hand כְּפֶ֣רֶץ <WH6556> like the breaking forth מָ֑יִם <WH4325> of waters עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> after that קָֽרְא֛וּ <WH7121> therefore they called שֵֽׁם־ <WH8034> the name הַמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> of that place הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he בַּ֥עַל פְּרָצִֽים׃ <WH1188> Baalperazim

וַיַּעַזְבוּ־ <WH5800> And when they had left שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֑ם <WH430> their gods וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> gave a commandment דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> there David וַיִּשָּׂרְפ֖וּ <WH8313> and they were burned בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> with fire פ
וַיֹּסִ֤יפוּ <WH3254> yet again עוֹד֙ <WH5750> yet פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> And the Philistines וַֽיִּפְשְׁט֖וּ <WH6584> spread themselves abroad בָּעֵֽמֶק׃ <WH6010> in the valley

וַיִּשְׁאַ֨ל <WH7592> enquired ע֤וֹד <WH5750> again דָּוִיד֙ <WH1732> Therefore David בֵּֽאלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> again of God וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לוֹ֙ הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> and God לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תַֽעֲלֶ֖ה <WH5927> unto him Go not up אַֽחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH310> after הָסֵב֙ <WH5437> them turn away מֵֽעֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> and וּבָ֥אתָ <WH935> from them and come לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> in מִמּ֥וּל <WH4136> upon them over against הַבְּכָאִֽים׃ <WH1057> the mulberry trees

וִ֠יהִי <WH1961> become כְּֽשָׁמְעֲךָ֞ <WH8085> And it shall be when thou shalt hear אֶת־ <WH853> ק֤וֹל <WH6963> a sound הַצְּעָדָה֙ <WH6807> of going בְּרָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> in the tops הַבְּכָאִ֔ים <WH1057> of the mulberry trees אָ֖ז <WH227> then תֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> [that] then thou shalt go out בַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> to battle כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יָצָ֤א <WH3318> is gone forth הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> for God לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> before לְהַכּ֖וֹת <WH5221> thee to smite אֶת־ <WH853> מַחֲנֵ֥ה <WH4264> the host פְלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <WH6430> of the Philistines

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> therefore did דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> David כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֖הוּ <WH6680> commanded הָֽאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> as God וַיַּכּוּ֙ <WH5221> him and they smote אֶת־ <WH853> מַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> the host פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> of the Philistines מִגִּבְע֖וֹן <WH1391> from Gibeon וְעַד־ <WH5704> far גָּֽזְרָה׃ <WH1507> even to Gazer

וַיֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> went out שֵׁם־ <WH8034> And the fame דָּוִ֖יד <WH1732> of David בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הָֽאֲרָצ֑וֹת <WH776> into all lands וַֽיהוָ֛ה <WH3068> and the LORD נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> brought אֶת־ <WH853> פַּחְדּ֖וֹ <WH6343> the fear עַל־ <WH5921> of כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> of him upon all nations
